body: While raging, the barbarian gains DR/lawful equal to 1/2 her barbarian level. Her weapons and natural weapons are considered chaotic for the purpose of overcoming damage reduction. A barbarian must have the chaos totem rage power to select this rage power. A barbarian must be at least 10th level to select this rage power.
name: Chaos Totem, Greater
url: pfsrd://Advanced Players Guide/Rules/Core Classes/Barbarian/Rage Powers/Chaos Totem/Greater
